channel.title: How To Use Sendkeys
channel.description:
this tutorial will show you how to send text by pressing a button (i use F1 and F2)
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/Whatyouneed.jpg[/img] when you have all of this stuff on your form make sure that the interval on timer1 is set to 275, and is enabled....
next is the code part....
[code]Private Sub Timer1_Timer() If GetAsyncKeyState(vbKeyF1) Then SendKeys Text1.Text SendKeys "{Enter}" End If
If GetAsyncKeyState(vbKeyF2) Then SendKeys Text2.Text SendKeys "{Enter}" End If End Sub[/code]
[IMG]http://i118.photobucket.com/albums/o105/santaselfboy/WHATTHINGSDO.jpg[/img]
next put this at the top of your source page
[code]Option Explicit Private Declare Function GetAsyncKeyState Lib "user32" (ByVal vkey As Long) As Integer[/code]

item.title: How To Use Sendkeys
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

Freddy1990:

Hmm, i think an interval of 500 on a timer might just eb long enough to miss a keypress if pressed fast, i used to just use 250-300

ok i changed it

Read full topic

item.title: How To Use Sendkeys
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

this tutorial will show you how to send text by pressing a button (i use F1 and F2)


when you have all of this stuff on your form make sure that the interval on timer1 is set to 275, and is enabled…

next is the code part…

[code]Private Sub Timer1_Timer()
If GetAsyncKeyState(vbKeyF1) Then
SendKeys Text1.Text
SendKeys “{Enter}”
End If

If GetAsyncKeyState(vbKeyF2) Then
    SendKeys Text2.Text
    SendKeys "{Enter}"
End If

End Sub[/code]

WHATTHINGSDO.jpg800×364

next put this at the top of your source page

Option Explicit Private Declare Function GetAsyncKeyState Lib "user32" (ByVal vkey As Long) As Integer

Read full topic
